_sText:
Map Info: mg_dance_or_die By ZaLoS This is DDR(dance dance revolution) for css. I made this DDR machine myself, completely from scratch. Dance! Dance! Dance! If you miss a step you take damage! All steps except the warmup round were custom made by me. (warmup round steps are generated at random) After about 2mins of dance battling youll be transported to the arena with a random weapon to finish each other off. Have fun!
How it works: The black screen contains the upcoming steps. The arrows immediately infront of you indicate which arrows you have recently pressed. When they turn blue you are pressing them. You have to stop pressing a button to press it again, you cant just stand on a button! When the black screen arrows change colors you are suppose to hit your own arrow in response, if you dont you get hurt! Each songs steps last about 2mins, at the end the winners are transported to the arena and given a random weapon or just knife fight.. This will be challenging at first till you get the hang of it! keep at it!
